source.8a0cff80:
import pandas as pd

X_train = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/used-car-price-dataset-competition-format/X_train.csv')
X_test = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/used-car-price-dataset-competition-format/X_test.csv')
y_train = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/used-car-price-dataset-competition-format/y_train.csv')
y_test = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/used-car-price-dataset-competition-format/test_label/y_test.csv')
source.a01ba92a:
X_train.drop(columns = ['carID'], inplace = True)
X_test.drop(columns = ['carID'], inplace = True)
source.d9de21d0:
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
X_train['brand'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_train['brand'])
X_train['model'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_train['model'])
X_train['transmission'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_train['transmission'])
X_train['fuelType'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_train['fuelType'])
X_test['brand'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_test['brand'])
X_test['model'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_test['model'])
X_test['transmission'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_test['transmission'])
X_test['fuelType'] = LabelEncoder().fit_transform(X_test['fuelType'])
source.c7949d26:
y_train.drop(columns = 'carID', inplace = True)
y_test.drop(columns = 'carID', inplace = True)
source.629bf4eb:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor

model_rf = RandomForestRegressor()

model_rf.fit(X_train, y_train)
model_rf.score(X_train, y_train)
pred_train = model_rf.predict(X_train)
source.5d2d5f0f:
import numpy as np
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
MSE = mean_squared_error(y_train, pred_train)
RMSE = np.sqrt(MSE)
source.64c4238d:
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
r2_score(y_train, pred_train)

source.ca8132c0:
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler

scaler = MinMaxScaler()

X_train['mileage'] = scaler.fit_transform(X_train[['mileage']])
X_train['tax'] = scaler.fit_transform(X_train[['tax']])
X_train['mpg'] = scaler.fit_transform(X_train[['mpg']])
X_test['mileage'] = scaler.transform(X_test[['mileage']])
X_test['tax'] = scaler.transform(X_test[['tax']])
X_test['mpg'] = scaler.transform(X_test[['mpg']])
